tour.content.myspace: Welcome to SkyDRM. MySpace is your personal space that enables you to store your files and share files securely.
tour.content.mydrive: MyDrive is the SkyDRM provided repository (1 GB) for storing your personal files.
tour.content.myvault: MyVault is the central store for all your protected (NXL) files.
tour.content.protect: Allows you to apply rights-protection to a file.
tour.content.share: You can share files with anyone securely. You can specify rights before sharing the file.
tour.content.add.repo: Configure third-party repositories such as Dropbox, Google Drive etc. with SkyDRM.
tour.content.create.project: Create a project and collaborate with project teams across organizations. Check out the free trial to try out the features!
